Class TransactionFactory

com.fortisbank.contracts.models.transactions.TransactionFactory

  • Method Details

    • createTransaction

      public static Transaction createTransaction(TransactionType type, String description, Date transactionDate, BigDecimal amount, Account sourceAccount, Account destinationAccount)
      Creates a transaction based on the specified type and parameters.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the transaction
      description - the description of the transaction
      transactionDate - the date of the transaction
      amount - the amount involved in the transaction
      sourceAccount - the source account of the transaction
      destinationAccount - the destination account of the transaction
      Returns:
      the created transaction
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the transaction type is invalid
